text: sem wait(8); sem wait(&c); sem wait(8b); sem wait(8b); sem post(8b); sem post(8b); sem wait(8c); sem post(8c); sem post(8c); sem post(8a); No deadlock, because 1 may (hold a then wait b), or (hold a then wait c) whereas thread 2 (hold c then wait b). The lock both parties need will be released by the other party.
